PickupInstructions.PickupInfo:
After luggage collection go outside the terminal where you arrived at (Ground Transportation Level One)and follow the instructions below.
.
Terminal A: Please proceed to the ground transportation level (Next car rental shuttle). A11, A12 or A13
Terminal B: Please proceed to the ground transportation level (Next car rental shuttle). B11, B12 or B13 
Terminal C: Please proceed to the ground transportation level (Next car rental shuttle). C277
Please provide your reservation to be able to board the shuttle. 

If you have any questions please call 954-360-8000 and a representative will arrange the pick-up for you in a courtesy shuttle of Next Car Rental to the office, located at 3255 McCoy Rd, Orlando, FL 32812, Florida.
